00043         virtual int             Compare(Object3D* that) {
00044                 double diff = this->GetDistanceFromCamera() - that->GetDistanceFromCamera();
00045                 if (diff > 0)
00046                         return 1;
00047                 else if (diff == 0)
00048                         return 0;
00049                 else 
00050                         return -1;
00051         }; // return 1 if this is further; 0 if the same distance; -1 otherwise
